DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether the ingestion of the common food additive carrageenan contributes to insulin resistance and thus to the pathogenesis of type 2 diabetes in humans.
DOC.brief_title: Study of Carrageenan's Effect on Insulin Resistance in Humans
DOC.criteria: body mass index (BMI) 18.5 29.9 kg/mÂ² any chronic illness any ongoing medication known infections known liver disease known renal insufficiency alcohol consumption over 30 g/d shift work
